price: E dEle é o que repousa na noite e no dia. E Ele é O Oniouvinte, O Onisciente.
arabic: ۞ وَلَهُۥ مَا سَكَنَ فِي ٱلَّيۡلِ وَٱلنَّهَارِۚ وَهُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: walahu mā sakana fī al-layli wal-nahāri wahuwa al-samīʿu al-ʿalīmu
